channel.title: anaconda on Orange
channel.description: Recent content in anaconda on Orange

item.title: Installing with Anaconda Navigator
item.description: We are fortunate enough to be featured on the front page of Anaconda Navigator, a graphical user interface for conda package management. Orange has been a conda package for some time now, since this is the easiest way to provide pre-compiled packages for Windows. And since most of our user base uses Windows, this was the way to go. If you are an avid Anaconda user and you wish to install Orange with Anaconda Navigator, there are some steps you need to take to ensure everything works correctly.
